[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /global/command.c

Handles commands from directories for living objects. /global/command.c from the Nightmare IVr1 Object Library handles commands of living objects created by Descartes of Borg 950323 Hacked for Discworld by Turrican 4-11-95

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/command.h

Method index

AddSearchPath(mixed)
Add a directory(s) into the search path for commands.
cmdAll(string)
Try and execute the command.
cmdPatterns(string)
This method tries to lookup the patterns for the given verb.
command_commands()
Add in the command catch all action.

A force event.
GetClient()
This tells us if we are a client.
GetForced()
This method returns if we are being forced or not

This method returns the current search path
query_current_cmd()
What are the args to the current verb?
query_current_verb()
What is the current verb?

Remove a directory(s) from the search path.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
AddSearchPath
string * AddSearchPath(mixed val)
Add a directory(s) into the search path for commands. If the input is an array then the members of that are added to the search path.

Parameters:
val - the path to array
Returns:
the new search path
eventForce
int eventForce(string cmd)
A force event.

Parameters:
cmd - the command to force
Returns:
0 on failure and 1 on success
GetClient
string GetClient()
This tells us if we are a client.

Returns:
always returns 0
GetForced
int GetForced()
This method returns if we are being forced or not

Returns:
1 if we are being forced
GetSearchPath
string * GetSearchPath()
This method returns the current search path

Returns:
the current search path
query_current_cmd
string query_current_cmd()
What are the args to the current verb?

query_current_verb
string query_current_verb()
What is the current verb?

RemoveSearchPath
string * RemoveSearchPath(mixed val)
Remove a directory(s) from the search path. If the input is an array then the members of that are added to the search path.

Parameters:
val - the directory(s) to remove
Returns:
the new search path

Protected Functions

These are functions that only objects inheriting the class can access.

cmdAll
int cmdAll(string args)
Try and execute the command. It calls the fuinction command_shadowed with the verb and args as parameters if the command is found to exist.

Parameters:
args - the args to use for the verb
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
cmdPatterns
mixed * cmdPatterns(string verb)
This method tries to lookup the patterns for the given verb.

Parameters:
verb - the verb to get the patterns for
Returns:
the array of patterns
See also:
/obj/handlers/pattern_compiler.c and /gloal/new_parse->add_command()
command_commands
void command_commands()
Add in the command catch all action.
